member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_EDITOR_UPDATE_PACKAGE_OPTION
member.summary: Options to use when updating an app package.

member.name: APPX_PACKAGE_EDITOR_UPDATE_PACKAGE_OPTION.APPX_PACKAGE_EDITOR_UPDATE_PACKAGE_OPTION_APPEND_DELTA
member.summary: Appends the delta (difference) of the baseline package and the updated package.
